org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.attachment
Class AeCompositeAttachmentStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.attachment.AeCompositeAttachmentStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAttachmentStorage
public class AeCompositeAttachmentStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeAttachmentStorage

Implements a composite attachment storage that chooses between a local storage implementation or a remote storage implementation depending on whether a process is persistent or not.

Field Summary
private  IAeAttachmentStorage mLocalStorage
          The local attachment storage implementation.
private  IAeAttachmentStorage mRemoteStorage
          The remote attachment storage implementation.
 
Constructor Summary
AeCompositeAttachmentStorage(IAeAttachmentStorage aRemoteStorage, IAeAttachmentStorage aLocalStorage)
          Constructs a composite attachment storage with the given local attachment storage implementation and remote attachment storage implementation.

Description copied from interface: IAeAttachmentStorage
Cleans up unassociated attachments.

This can only be done at engine startup.

createAttachmentGroup

public long createAttachmentGroup(IAeProcessPlan aPlan)
                           throws AeBusinessProcessException
Overrides method to create the attachment group remotely or locally depending on whether the process is persistent or not. Returns a negative group id if the attachment group is stored locally.
